name: Dissonance Spec
desc:
While in Rhapsody of Flame, increases all Luck Chance acquired by any means by 50%.

Healing of Stillness: If you deal no DMG to enemies for 5s, each hit of your Basic Attack will heal up to 10 allies (prioritizing Allies), with the full 4-hit combo restoring 15.05% of their max HP in total.

name: Intellect
desc: Intellect + 10

name: Intellect
desc: Intellect + 10

name: Severed Chapter
desc:
Increases Resilience Break Efficiency of self and Allies within 30 meters by 10%. This effect cannot stack.
After activating Heroic Melody, you and Allies within 30 meters deal 10% more DMG to defeated targets. This effect cannot stack.

name: Sound Blaze
desc:
Gains 1 Soundwave Energy each time you deal DMG equal to 10 times ATK.
Soundwave Energy stores up to 50.
Skills consuming Performance Passion trigger Scorching Impact when dealing DMG, consuming all Soundwave Energy. Each 1 Soundwave Energy increases Scorching Impact DMG by 10%.

name: Trio Rhapsody
desc: Rhapsody of Flame always appears in its most powerful form. While in Rhapsody of Flame, healing +20%.

name: Stamina
desc: Stamina + 30

name: Intellect
desc: Intellect + 10

desc: Stamina + 30

desc: Stamina + 30

desc: Stamina + 30

name: Intellect
desc: Intellect + 10

name: Luck Multiplier
desc:
Every 1% Luck grants 0.5% Lucky Hit DMG Multiplier.
After activating Heroic Melody, doubles its conversion efficiency.

name: Swing Reflux
desc: Hitting a target with Fierce Strike recovers 5 Performance Energy. Each additional target hit provides 1 extra Performance Energy, up to 10 total.

name: Restart
desc: When Harmonic Anthem or Fierce Strike triggers a Lucky Hit, limited to a single activation when striking multiple targets, immediately resets Rhapsody of Flame's CD and allows Rhapsody of Flame not to consume Performance Passion for 10s, this effect is nullified upon casting Rhapsody of Flame.

name: Stamina
desc: Stamina + 30

name: Intellect
desc: Intellect + 10

name: Fire Day
desc: Increases Fire Bonus by 8% when attacking Elite or higher targets.

name: Fire Attack
desc: Fire Attack + 5

name: Stamina
desc: Stamina + 30

name: Fire Attack
desc: Fire Attack + 5

name: Healing Note
desc:
Basic Attack deals an extra instance of DMG.
For every 5 Soundwave Energy obtained, creates a Note for the ally with the lowest HP (Allies prioritized).

name: Lucky Soundwave
desc: Gains 1 Soundwave Energy whenever Expertise Skill or Amplified Beat trigger a Lucky Hit.

name: Rhythm Spirit
desc: Defeating an enemy has a fixed 50% chance to grant you 1 Performance Passion.

name: Indomitable Chord
desc: While Heroic Melody is active, grants Super Armor, increases DMG Reduction by 25%, and boosts movement speed by 10%.

name: Blazing Heal
desc: Stores excess Healing (up to 500% of Max HP). After activating Heroic Melody, consumes stored Healing to recover allies' HP every 1 second, up to 15% of Max HP per second.

name: Infinite Rhapsody
desc: Replace Ultimate Rock the Stage with Infinite Rhapsody.

name: Intellect
desc: Intellect + 10

desc: Stamina + 30

desc: Fire Attack + 5

desc: Stamina + 30

desc: Stamina + 30

name: Stamina
desc: Stamina + 30

name: Resonant Counterpoint
desc: When a Note forms, there's a 50% fixed chance to create an extra Note for a different target.

name: Soundwave Overclock
desc: Upon casting Center Stage, grants 15 Soundwave Energy, and doubles all the Soundwave Energy gained in the next 10s.

name: Encore Persistance
desc:
Permanently benefits from Encore effect.
For every 5 triggers of Encore Strings, the next Amplified Beat and Harmonic Anthem deal 50% more DMG.

name: Flame's Rampage
desc:
When Heroic Melody is active, Rhapsody of Flame will erupt, dealing Magic Damage equal to 50% ATK every 3s to targets it touches (DMG interval affected by Haste).
While in Rhapsody of Flame, each hit of Harmonic Anthem also heals 1 ally with the lowest HP for 30% of the DMG dealt.

name: Flame Note
desc: When you use an Expertise Skill, Rhapsody of Flame will erupt with Rhythm, dealing Magic Damage equal to 100% of ATK and granting Note to allies it touches.

desc: Stamina + 30

desc: Fire Attack + 5

name: Stamina
desc: Stamina + 30

name: Sonic Therapy
desc: Converted healing from DMG +20% for targets affected by Note.

name: Encore Sharp Strike
desc: Triggering Encore Strings to deal DMG or healing grants 2 Performance Energy. If the Encore Strings triggers Lucky Hit, grants 3 additional Performance Energy.

name: Encore Chain
desc: When Encore Strings triggers, it activates a second time on the same target.

name: Concerto
desc:
During Rhapsody of Flame, Amplified Beat gains 1 additional attack.
Amplified Beat's DMG -20%.

name: Fire Attack
desc: Fire Attack + 5

name: Zenith Center Stage: Mad Tune
desc: Each Performance Passion consumed reduces the CD of Center Stage by 1 second.

name: Intellect
desc: Intellect + 10

name: Fire Attack
desc: Fire Attack + 5

name: Sonic Cure
desc: When Expertise deal DMG (only triggers once when hitting multiple targets), additionally heal targets with Note.

name: Intellect
desc: Intellect + 10

name: Encore Luck Boost
desc: Every 1% Luck Chance grants 1% trigger chance for Encore Strings.

name: Critical Acclaim
desc:
During Center Stage, triggering Encore Strings has a 30% fixed chance to grant Passion Surge.
Passion Surge: Special Attack costs zero Performance Passion for 10s. Removed after Special Attack is cast.

name: Tower Multiwave
desc: Casting Center Stage immediately extends Heroic Melody by 5s.

name: Stamina
desc: Stamina + 30

name: Stamina
desc: Stamina + 30

name: Finale Command
desc: Within 10s of casting Encore, each use of Rhapsody of Flame caused targets affected by Encore to trigger Encore Strings.

name: Absolute Center Stage
desc: After you use Center Stage, the number of enhanced skills increases from 1 to 2.
